content:
aranello (Italy), September 1, 2025 – Ferrari N.V. (NYSE/EXM: RACE) (“Ferrari” or the “Company”) informs that the Company has purchased, under the Euro 360 million share buyback program announced on July 31, 2025, as the eighth tranche of the multi-year share buyback program of approximately Euro 2 billion expected to be executed by 2026 in line with the disclosure made during the 2022 Capital Markets Day (the “Eighth Tranche”), the additional common shares - reported in aggregate form, on a daily basis - on the Euronext Milan (EXM) and on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) as follows:

(*) translated at the European Central Bank EUR/USD exchange reference rate as of the date of each purchase

 

Since the announcement of such Eighth Tranche till August 29, 2025, the total invested consideration has been:
• Euro 22,450,220.37 for No. 55,300 common shares purchased on the EXM
• USD 5,808,408.76 (Euro 4,978,370.35*) for No. 12,166 common shares purchased on the NYSE.

As of August 29, 2025, the Company held in treasury No. 15,773,441 common shares equal to 8.73% of the total issued share capital including the common shares and the special voting shares, net of shares assigned under the Company’s equity incentive plan.



Since the start of the multi-year share buyback program of approximately Euro 2 billion announced during the 2022 Capital Markets Day, on July 1, 2022, until August 29, 2025, the Company has purchased a total of 5,078,486 own common shares on EXM and NYSE, including transactions for Sell to Cover, for a total consideration of Euro 1,669,998,288.08.
summary: Ferrari N.V. (Ferrario, or the "Company", has purchased a total of €360 million in shares under the Euro 360 million share buyback program announced on July 31, 2025 as the eighth tranche of the multi-year share buyingback program, expected to be executed by 2026. The additional common shares purchased on the Euronext Milan (EXM) and the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) are reported in aggregate form, on a daily basis, as follows: The total invested consideration for each purchase has been €22,450,220.37 for No. 55,300 common shares bought on the EXM and No. 12,166 common shares on the NYSE. The Company also held in treasury No. 19,774.
shortSummary: Ferrari N.V.E.R.S.W.A.S., also known as Ferrari, has purchased additional common shares in the Euro 360 million share buyback program.
argos_summary: Ferrari N.V. completed the eighth tranche of its €360 million share buyback program, purchasing 55,300 shares on Euronext Milan and 12,166 on the NYSE, spending €22.45 million and $5.81 million respectively. The buyback has added 15.77 million shares to treasury, representing 8.73 % of issued capital. Since the program’s launch in July 2022, Ferrari has repurchased 5.08 million shares for a total consideration of €1.67 billion. The move underscores the company’s continued commitment to returning capital to shareholders.
